metadata.ground_truth: Not required, but highly recommended during dinner hours. They also offer online booking if that's convenient.
metadata.predicted: Yes, you will need to make a reservation at the GreenFork Bistro. Do you have any other questions?

conversation.content: Can you recommend a restaurant that serves gluten-free meals?
Absolutely! GreenFork Bistro has an extensive gluten-free menu including pasta, breads, and desserts. They’re known for careful cross-contamination practices. Want to hear customer favorites?
Yes, you will need to make a reservation at the GreenFork Bistro. Do you have any other questions?

That won't work—like I said before, I need options that won't force me into a reservation every time. We already went over GreenFork; what about other gluten-free restaurants nearby that take walk-ins or have flexible hours? <END> bye
